title: Luxurious Modern Duplex Oasis in Prestigious Żoliborz
description: Experience modern living at its finest in this exquisite duplex offering 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 elegantly appointed bathrooms across 132 square meters. Featuring an open-concept living space that seamlessly blends with a bespoke modern kitchen, this home is designed with both entertaining and daily tranquility in mind. Floor-to-ceiling windows illuminate the impeccable finishes, while access to a private balcony creates your own haven above city life. A rare EV charging station and a dedicated barbecue zone ensure unparalleled comfort and convenience.
neighborhood_description: Located in the vibrant heart of Warsaw’s sought-after Żoliborz district, this residence enjoys a prime balance of lively urban energy and peaceful neighborhood ambiance. From scenic bike lanes winding through the area to excellent public transport and nearby highways, connectivity here is unrivaled. Trendy cafes, leafy parks, and pet-friendly amenities provide a welcoming retreat for sophisticated urban dwellers.
lifestyle_benefits: proximity to vibrant cafes and parks
easy commuting by bike or metro
target_buyer: Discerning professionals or families with pets who value sophistication, eco-friendly living, and direct access to Warsaw’s rich amenities.
market_positioning: Occupying a premium niche among Warsaw rentals, this duplex stands out for rare features like an EV charging station, superior pet-friendly design, and proximity to picturesque, vibrant city life. It’s positioned for buyers demanding urban luxury and lifestyle upgrades unmatched in Żoliborz.
